trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access on the server to the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<table>" name="<table>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Tillater programmatisk tilgang på serveren for å HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<table>" name="<table>" href=""> </xref> elementet.

trans-unit.source: Use the HtmlTable control to programmatically control the HTML `<table>` element on the server.
trans-unit.target: Bruk HtmlTable-kontrollen til å kontrollere programmatisk HTML `<table>` element på serveren.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a table on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan du opprette en tabell i en webside.

trans-unit.source: You can dynamically change the appearance of the `<table>` element by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BgColor%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Border%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BorderColor%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Height%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Width%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre utseendet til dynamisk den `<table>` elementet ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BgColor%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Border%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BorderColor%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Height%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Width%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Border%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BgColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also control how the content of a cell is displayed by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Align%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CellPadding%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CellSpacing%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også kontrollere hvordan innholdet i en celle skal vises ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Align%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CellPadding%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CellSpacing%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CellSpacing%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CellPadding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Align%2A>

trans-unit.source: The rows of the HtmlTable control are stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: Radene kontrollens HtmlTable lagres i det <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A>-egenskapen for kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically access the individual rows of the table.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du programmatisk tilgang til de individuelle radene i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A complex table model is not supported.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En sammensatt tabell modell støttes ikke.

trans-unit.source: You cannot have an HtmlTable control with nested `<caption>`, `<col>`, `<colgroup>`, `<tbody>`, `<thead>`, or `<tfoot>` elements.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke ha en HtmlTable kontroll med nestede `<caption>`, `<col>`, `<colgroup>`, `<tbody>`, `<thead>`, eller `<tfoot>` elementer.

trans-unit.source: These elements are removed without warning and do not appear in the output HTML.
trans-unit.target: Disse elementene blir fjernet uten advarsel og vises ikke i HTML-utdataene.

trans-unit.source: An exception will be thrown if you attempt to programmatically add these table model elements to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection of the HtmlTable control.
trans-unit.target: Vil bli utløst et unntak hvis du prøver å legge til disse tabellen modellelementer til programmatisk den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samlingen kontrollens HtmlTable.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of HtmlTable, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av HtmlTable, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å opprette og starte en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdien for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>|The "table" literal string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>| "Tabell" strenglitteral. |</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control in relation to other elements on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen for det <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollen i forhold til andre elementer i websiden.

trans-unit.source: Use the Align property to specify the alignment of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control in relation to other elements on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen Juster til å angi justering for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>kontrollen i forhold til andre elementer i websiden.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property does not control the alignment of the contents in the cells of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Egenskapen kontrollerer ikke justeringen av innholdet i cellene i de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: To control the alignment of contents of an individual cell, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Align%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.VAlign%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> class.
trans-unit.target: For å styre justeringen av innholdet i enkelte celler, Bruk <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Align%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.VAlign%2A>Egenskaper for <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.VAlign%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Align%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also control the alignment of contents of the cells in an entire row by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Align%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.VAlign%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også kontrollere justeringen av innholdet i cellene i en hel rad ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Align%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.VAlign%2A>Egenskaper for <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.VAlign%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Align%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the values that can be used for this property.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser verdiene som kan brukes for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: |Value|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`Left`|Aligns the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control on the left edge of the Web page.| |`Center`|Aligns the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control in the middle of the Web page.| |`Right`|Aligns the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control on the right edge of the Web page.| > [!NOTE] > If you specify `Left` or `Right` alignment, other elements on the Web page will wrap to the right or left of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control, respectively.
trans-unit.target: | Verdien | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | `Left`| Justerer <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>-kontroll på venstre side av websiden. | | `Center`| Kontrollen <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>midt i websiden justert. | | `Right`| Justerer <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>kontrollen i høyre kant av websiden. | > [!NOTE] > Hvis du angir `Left` eller `Right` justering andre elementer på websiden brytes mot høyre eller venstre for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>kontrollere henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: If you specify `Center` alignment, no wrapping occurs and other elements appear below the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir `Center` justering ingen wrapping oppstår og andre elementer vises under kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The alignment of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control in relation to other elements on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Justering av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollen i forhold til andre elementer i websiden.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfargen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the BgColor property to specify the background color of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk BgColor-egenskapen til å angi bakgrunnsfargen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en farge etter navn eller ved å bruke en heksadesimal verdi som begynner med tegnet du firkant (#), i formatet #RRGGBB.

trans-unit.source: RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively.
trans-unit.target: RR GG og BB representerer heksadesimale verdier fra 0 til 255 som angir røde, grønne og blå komponentene til en farge henholdsvis.

trans-unit.source: For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel representerer verdien #0000FF blå.

trans-unit.source: It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component.
trans-unit.target: Den angir minimumsverdien (00) for de røde og grønne komponentene ved å angi maksimumsverdien (AA) for den blå komponenten.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the BgColor property.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser&16; forhåndsdefinerte HTML for navn og tilhørende heksadesimale verdiene som kan brukes for egenskapen BgColor.

trans-unit.source: For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om HTML farger, kan du se den [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) webområdet](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125).

trans-unit.source: |Color name|Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |Aqua|#00FFFF| |Black|#000000| |Blue|#0000FF| |Fuchsia|#FF00FF| |Gray|#808080| |Green|#008000| |Lime|#00FF00| |Maroon|#800000| |Navy|#000080| |Olive|#808000| |Purple|#800080| |Red|#FF0000| |Silver|#C0C0C0| |Teal|#008080| |White|#FFFFFF| |Yellow|#FFFF00| The available colors for use with the BgColor property can be determined from the <xref:System.Drawing.KnownColor> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: | Fargenavnet på | Heksadesimale verdien | |----------------|-----------------------| | Akvamarin |�FFFF | | Svart |�0 | | Blå |�FF | | Fuksia | #FF00FF | | Grått |𓮨0 | | Grønn |̠0 | | Lime |�FF00 | | Rødbrun |𓢀0 | | Mørk blå |0 | | Mosegrønn |𓮠0 | | Lilla |𓢈0 | | Red | #FF0000 | | Sølv | #C0C0C0 | | Blågrønn |̨0 | | Bare | #FFFFFF | | Gul | #FFFF00 | Farger som er tilgjengelige for bruk med egenskapen BgColor kan fastslås fra den <xref:System.Drawing.KnownColor>opplisting.</xref:System.Drawing.KnownColor>

trans-unit.source: Color names are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: Farge er samlingstype.

trans-unit.source: The background color of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Bakgrunnsfargen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width (in pixels) of the border of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bredden (i piksler) på kantlinjen på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Border property to specify the width of the border.
trans-unit.target: Bruk kantlinje-egenskapen til å angi bredden på kantlinjen.

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to display a border for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control, set this property to either 0 (no border width) or -1 (border width is not set).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil vise en kantlinje for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>kontrollere, angi denne egenskapen til 0 (ingen Kantlinjetykkelse) eller -1 (Kantlinjetykkelse er ikke angitt).</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: The width (in pixels) of the border of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Bredden (i piksler) på kantlinjen på en <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that the border width is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er -1, som angir kantlinjebredden ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kantlinjefargen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the BorderColor property to specify the border color of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk kantlinjefarge-egenskapen til å angi kantlinjefargen på den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en farge etter navn eller ved å bruke en heksadesimal verdi som begynner med tegnet du firkant (#), i formatet #RRGGBB.

trans-unit.source: RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively.
trans-unit.target: RR GG og BB representerer heksadesimale verdier fra 0 til 255 som angir røde, grønne og blå komponentene til en farge henholdsvis.

trans-unit.source: For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel representerer verdien #0000FF blå.

trans-unit.source: It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component.
trans-unit.target: Den angir minimumsverdien (00) for de røde og grønne komponentene ved å angi maksimumsverdien (AA) for den blå komponenten.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the BorderColor property.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser&16; forhåndsdefinerte HTML for navn og tilhørende heksadesimale verdiene som kan brukes for kantlinjefarge-egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om HTML farger, kan du se den [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) webområdet](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125).

trans-unit.source: |Color name|Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |Aqua|#00FFFF| |Black|#000000| |Blue|#0000FF| |Fuchsia|#FF00FF| |Gray|#808080| |Green|#008000| |Lime|#00FF00| |Maroon|#800000| |Navy|#000080| |Olive|#808000| |Purple|#800080| |Red|#FF0000| |Silver|#C0C0C0| |Teal|#008080| |White|#FFFFFF| |Yellow|#FFFF00| The available colors for use with the BorderColor property can be determined from the <xref:System.Drawing.KnownColor> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: | Fargenavnet på | Heksadesimale verdien | |----------------|-----------------------| | Akvamarin |�FFFF | | Svart |�0 | | Blå |�FF | | Fuksia | #FF00FF | | Grått |𓮨0 | | Grønn |̠0 | | Lime |�FF00 | | Rødbrun |𓢀0 | | Mørk blå |0 | | Mosegrønn |𓮠0 | | Lilla |𓢈0 | | Red | #FF0000 | | Sølv | #C0C0C0 | | Blågrønn |̨0 | | Bare | #FFFFFF | | Gul | #FFFF00 | Farger som er tilgjengelige for bruk med egenskapen kantlinjefarge kan fastslås fra den <xref:System.Drawing.KnownColor>opplisting.</xref:System.Drawing.KnownColor>

trans-unit.source: Color names are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: Farge er samlingstype.

trans-unit.source: The border color of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Kantlinjefargen på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir avstanden (i piksler) mellom innholdet i en celle, og den cellen kantlinjen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the CellPadding property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen CellPadding for å kontrollere avstanden mellom innholdet i en celle, og den cellen kantlinje.

trans-unit.source: The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Hvor utfylling angitt legges til alle sidene i cellen.

trans-unit.source: All cells in a column share the same cell width; therefore, the spacing is applied to the widest cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: Alle celler i en kolonne deler samme cellebredde; avstanden brukes derfor største celle i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same cell height.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte deler alle celler i samme rad samme cellehøyden.

trans-unit.source: The spacing is applied to the tallest cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: Avstanden brukes på den høyeste cellen i raden.

trans-unit.source: Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: Enkelte celler størrelser kan ikke angis.

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Avstanden (i piksler) mellom innholdet i en celle, og den cellen kantlinjen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er -1, som indikerer at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space (in pixels) between adjacent cells in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir avstanden (i piksler) mellom tilstøtende celler i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the CellSpacing property to control the spacing between individual cells in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk CellSpacing-egenskapen for å kontrollere avstanden mellom individuelle celler i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Denne avstand brukes både loddrett og vannrett.

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between adjacent cells in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Avstanden (i piksler) mellom tilstøtende celler i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er -1, som indikerer at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> objekt den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlCollection method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> object that is used to hold table rows.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateControlCollection oppretter en <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>objekt som brukes til å inneholde rader.</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlCollection method is primarily of interest to control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateControlCollection er primært interessant for kontrollutviklere utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control's child server controls.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> som inneholder den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollens underordnede serverkontroller.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir høyden på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Height property to control the height of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruke Height-egenskapen til å kontrollere høyden på den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: The height is normally specified in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Høyden er vanligvis angitt i piksler.

trans-unit.source: However, you can also specify a percentage of the browser window height by appending a percent sign (%) to the value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid også angi en prosent av nettleseren vindushøyden ved å legge til et prosent tegn (%) til verdien.

trans-unit.source: For example, the value `100%` indicates a height for the table that is the full height of the browser window.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel verdien `100%` angir en høyde for tabellen som er fullstendig høyden på leservinduet.

trans-unit.source: The table automatically expands and contracts as the user changes the window size.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen utvides og reduseres når brukeren endrer størrelsen på automatisk.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you specify a value that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control, this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du angir en verdi som er mindre enn kreves for å vise innholdet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>kontroll, denne egenskapen ignoreres.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: The height of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content between the opening and closing tags of the control, without automatically converting special characters to their equivalent HTML entities.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir innhold mellom innledende og avsluttende koder kontrollens, uten å konvertere automatisk spesialtegn til de tilsvarende HTML-enhetene.

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported for this control.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen støttes ikke for denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The content between the opening and closing tags of the control.
trans-unit.target: Innhold mellom innledende og avsluttende koder i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to read from or assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å lese fra eller tilordne en verdi for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content between the opening and closing tags of the control, with automatic conversion of special characters to their equivalent HTML entities.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir innhold mellom innledende og avsluttende koder kontrollens, med automatisk konvertering av spesialtegn til de tilsvarende HTML-enhetene.

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported for this control.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen støttes ikke for denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The content between the opening and closing tags of the control.
trans-unit.target: Innhold mellom innledende og avsluttende koder i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to read from or assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å lese fra eller tilordne en verdi for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control's child controls to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser av <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollens underordnede kontroller til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The RenderChildren method provides additional formatting before and after calling the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderChildren gir ekstra formatering før og etter kaller basisklassen <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The additional formatting makes the rendered HTML of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control easier to read by inserting a line return and indenting before rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control's child controls.
trans-unit.target: Ekstra formatering gjør gjengitte HTML-koden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>kontrollen enklere å lese ved å sette inn en linje return og innrykkingen før gjengivelse av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>kontrollens underordnede kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: The RenderChildren method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderChildren brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som mottar gjengitte innholdet.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control's end tag.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser av <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollens sluttkoden.

trans-unit.source: The RenderEndTag method provides additional formatting after calling the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderEndTag%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderEndTag gir ekstra formatering etter kaller basisklassen <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderEndTag%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderEndTag%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The additional formatting makes the rendered HTML of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control easier to read by inserting a line return after the closing `<table>` tag.
trans-unit.target: Ekstra formatering gjør gjengitte HTML-koden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>kontrollen enklere å lese ved å sette inn en linje returnere etter lukkingen `<table>` koden.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.RenderChildren%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.RenderChildren%2A>metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.RenderChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som mottar gjengitte innholdet.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRowCollection"></xref> collection that contains all the rows in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRowCollection"> </xref> samlingen som inneholder alle radene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Rows collection to programmatically access the rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk samlingen rader programmatisk tilgang radene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically add rows to, remove rows from, or insert rows into the collection.
trans-unit.target: Programmatisk kan du legge rader for å fjerne rader fra eller sette inn rader i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If there are no `<tr>` elements listed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control, an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRowCollection> object is returned.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis det finnes ingen `<tr>` elementer som er oppført i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>kontrollerer et tomt <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRowCollection>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRowCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRowCollection"></xref> that contains all the rows in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRowCollection"> </xref> som inneholder alle radene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bredden på de <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Width property to control the width of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk bredde-egenskapen for å kontrollere bredden på de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: The width is normally specified in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Bredden er vanligvis angitt i piksler.

trans-unit.source: However, you can also specify a percentage of the browser window width by appending a percent sign (%) to the value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid også angi en prosentdel av bredden nettleseren vinduet ved å legge til et prosent tegn (%) til verdien.

trans-unit.source: For example, the value `100%` indicates a width for the table that is the full width of the browser window.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel verdien `100%` angir en bredde for tabellen som er fullstendig bredden på leservinduet.

trans-unit.source: The table automatically expands and contracts as the user changes the window size.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen utvides og reduseres når brukeren endrer størrelsen på automatisk.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you specify a value that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control, this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du angir en verdi som er mindre enn kreves for å vise innholdet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>kontroll, denne egenskapen ignoreres.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: The width of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Bredden på de <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> kontrollen.
